short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you stay focused, optimize your time, and keep moving in the right direction toward your goals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block distracting websites while you work to help you focus on what matters.

By manually turning on focus mode or starting the countdown timer, you can block all of those distracting websites that pull you away from achieving your goals.

Are you starting a business or a side hustle?  Do you keep putting on your tasks to steam shows or browse social media?  This extension is for you.

You can add websites to a block list and the extension will block you from viewing them while the focus mode is turned on (either manually or by the timer).

☆☆  Key Features ☆☆

✓ Toggle focus mode on and off on demand
✓ Set a focus timer with custom timer durations
✓ Set your own custom website block list
✓ Website blocked page displays time remaining on the timer and an inspirational quote

To Use This Extension
1. Go to the settings page and add websites to the list you wish to block
2. Toggle the switch at the top of the main page to manually turn focus mode on or off.
3. Click a custom time and start the timer to set focus mode for a specific amount of time.

When focus mode is on and you try to access a blocked website, you will be directed to the OptimEyes blocked page which features the time remaining in your focus time (if using the timer) and an inspirational quote.

The quotes are randomized and we continue to add more meaningful quotes to the list.

Please consider donating as it is the only way development can continue on this extension.

☆☆ Privacy & Security ☆☆ 
We at OptimEyes are committed to protecting your privacy. The information we gather or process is used solely for core functionality of Momentum and to improve the quality and security of our service. Your information isn’t and has never been sold to third parties.
